subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers goalie stopped 29 shots for his 150th N.H.L. victory and his 21st career shutout in a 1-0 victory over the Bruins.
snippet: The Rangers goalie stopped 29 shots for his 150th N.H.L. victory and his 21st career shutout in a 1-0 victory over the Bruins.
